issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement Boyer-Moore string search algorithm for functions doing string matching
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7278](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7278). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5902#discussion_r351159392

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7278?focusedCommentId=17155280) by Chris Channing (c.channing):*
`[~projjal]`  are you currently working on this issue? If not, I'd be happy to take it on.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7278?focusedCommentId=17155982) by Projjal Chanda (projjal):*
Sure [~c.channing] go ahead.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7278?focusedCommentId=17565507) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
